hero.description: Discobolos is an Ultimate Frisbee community inspired by the ancient spirit of athletics. We're united by our love for the game and the timeless values of fair play and competition.

cta.title: Ready to Hit the Field?
cta.description: Whether you're a seasoned pro or picking up a disc for the first time, there's a spot for you on our roster.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Relive our best moments - from championship victories to team bonding events. All albums are hosted on Google Photos for easy viewing and sharing.
gallery.integration_desc: Our photo albums are hosted on Google Photos. Click on any album to view all photos in a beautiful, full-screen gallery. You can also download, share, or add your own photos to team albums!

events_page.description: Stay up to date with all our practices, matches, tournaments, and social gatherings. We'd love to see you on the field!

descriptions.weekly_practice: Regular team practice session. All skill levels welcome. Bring water and cleats!

descriptions.pizza_night: Monthly team bonding event. Good food, great company, and maybe some disc golf!

descriptions.friendly_match: Casual scrimmage with our friends from across the bay.
